scripts.build: npm run node_assets && npm run eleventy:build
scripts.node_assets: cp node_modules/normalize.css/normalize.css src/assets/modules/ && cp node_modules/simple-jscalendar/source/jsCalendar.min.css src/assets/modules/ && cp node_modules/simple-jscalendar/source/jsCalendar.min.js src/assets/modules/
